name: UltimateBeltsSpaceAgeFork
title: Ultimate Belts Space Age Fork
author: original: Jabor047, Fork: mcmodderHD
description: Enables an additional five tiers of belts to the game, beyond what is currently available from other mods. The fastest belt in this mod is equivalent to 6 express belts. Based of Tyarns' UltimateBelts mod
